name: Magistus Grimoire Crowley
text: You can send 1 Spellcaster monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand. You can declare 1 Attribute; this card becomes that Attribute until the end of this turn. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Magistus" monster you control; equip 1 "Magistus" monster from your GY to it, except a Level 4 monster. You can only use each effect of "Magistus Grimoire Crowley" once per turn.
